headline.print_headline: Turkish President Erdogan Appoints Divisive Aide as Economic Adviser
headline.main: Turkish President Erdogan Appoints Divisive Aide as Economic Adviser

lead_paragraph: Newly inaugurated Turkish president Tayyip Erdogan has appointed his close aide Yigit Bulut to be his chief economics adviser, his office said on Saturday, a move likely to alarm investors already concerned over the management of the country's finances.
